fields.name: txtPrt1NonContri
fields.title: Line 1. Enter your nondeductible contributions to traditional IRAs for 2021, including those made for 2021 from January 1, 2022, through April 18, 2022

fields.name: txtPrt1IraBasis
fields.title: Line 2. Enter your total basis in traditional IRAs

fields.name: txtPrt1Add1
fields.title: This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtPrt1ContMade
fields.title: Line 4. Enter those contributions included on line 1 that were made from January 1, 2022, through April 18, 2022

fields.name: txtPrt1Sub1
fields.title: This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtPrt1AllSEP
fields.title: Line 6. Enter the value of all your traditional, SEP, and SIMPLE IRAs as of December 31, 2021, plus any outstanding rollovers. Subtract any repayments of qualified disaster distributions (see 2021 Forms 8915-D and 8915-F)

fields.name: txtPrt1DistSEP
fields.title: Line 7. Enter your distributions from traditional, SEP, and SIMPLE IRAs in 2021. Do not include rollovers (other than repayments of qualified disaster distributions (see 2021 Forms 8915-D and 8915-F)), qualified charitable distributions, a one-time distribution to fund an HSA, conversions to a Roth IRA, certain returned contributions, or recharacterizations of traditional IRA contributions (see instructions)

fields.name: txtPrt1NetSEP
fields.title: Line 8. Enter the net amount you converted from traditional, SEP, and SIMPLE IRAs to Roth IRAs in 2021. Also, enter this amount on line 16

fields.name: txtPrt1Add2
fields.title: This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtPrt1Divide1
fields.title: This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtPrt1Multiply1
fields.title: This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtPrt1Multiply2
fields.title: This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtPrt1Add3
fields.title: This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtPrt1Sub2
fields.title: This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtPrt1Subln12FrmLn7
fields.title: This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtPrt1QualHurricDist
fields.title: Line 15b. Enter the amount on line 15a attributable to qualified disaster distributions from 2021 Forms 8915-D and 8915-F (see instructions). Also, enter this amount on 2021 Form 8915-D, line 23; or 2021 Form 8915-F, line 18, as applicable

fields.name: txtPrt1Result
fields.title: This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtFrm8606RecName
fields.title: Name - This field will be automatically populated for you

fields.name: txtFrm8606RecSSN
fields.title: SSN - This field will be automatically populated for you

fields.name: txtPrt2NetSEP
fields.title: Line 16. If you completed Part I, enter the amount from line 8. Otherwise, enter the net amount you converted from traditional, SEP, and SIMPLE IRAs to Roth IRAs in 2021

fields.name: txtPrt2Basis
fields.title: Line 17. If you completed Part I, enter the amount from line 11. Otherwise, enter your basis in the amount on line 16

fields.name: txtPrt2Result
fields.title: This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtPrt3RothIRA
fields.title: Line 19. Enter your total nonqualified distributions from Roth IRAs in 2021, including any qualified first-time homebuyer distributions, and any qualified disaster distributions. Also, see 2021 Forms 8915-D and 8915-F

fields.name: txtPrt3HomeBuy
fields.title: Line 20. Qualified first-time homebuyer expenses Do not enter more than $10, 000 reduced by the total of all your prior qualified first-time homebuyer distributions

fields.name: txtPrt3Sub1
fields.title: This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtPrt3IraBasis
fields.title: Line 22. Enter your basis in Roth IRA contributions  If line 21 is zero, stop here

fields.name: txtPrt3Sub2
fields.title: This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtPrt3IraConver
fields.title: Line 24. Enter your basis in conversions from traditional, SEP, and SIMPLE IRAs and rollovers from qualified retirement plans to a Roth IRA

fields.name: txtPrt3SubLn24FrmLn23
fields.title: This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtPrt3QualHurricDist
fields.title: Line 25b. Enter the amount on line 25a attributable to qualified disaster distributions from 2021 Forms 8915-D and 8915-F (see instructions). Also, enter this amount on 2021 Form 8915-D, line 24; or 2021 Form 8915-F, line 19, as applicable
